body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service at Swift Autos. My name is Eric Rogers. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Eric, my name is Sara Martin.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sara. To assist you better, may I have your phone number, please? Please spell out the numbers for me.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is seven seven zero five four three two one zero nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you kindly provide me with your email address as well, using words for the numbers?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is sara dot martin at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Sara. Is there anything specific you would like to discuss or any concerns you have regarding our products or services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm quite happy with the quality of the car I purchased. No concerns at the moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's great to hear, Sara. Thank you for your positive feedback. I appreciate your time today. If you have any future questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
